Judul: ENHANCED OIL RECOVERY SCREENING METHOD WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED ON FUZZY LOGIC ALGORITHM
Abstrak:
This study is related to the development of the EOR screening program using Fuzzy Logic. To decide the best
EOR strategy in the oil field with minimal human error, a robust and easy-to-use program with precise and fast
results. The technique uses Python programming language to apply the basic concept of Fuzzy Logic. The results
show that the program functions well and fulfills the assumptions. This depends on the fair and square of
comparability because the test uses contextual analysis in the field contained in the paper. For additional
exploration, it is advisable to consider economic factors, field conditions with unique substances, e.g., high levels
of paraffin, etc., which are helpful to broaden the accuracy of the EOR method.
Kata Kunci: Screening EOR, Python Programming, Artificial Intelligence, Fuzzy Logic.
